headline: Masters 2022 Odds
sentences:
You can find the list of the most notable Masters 2022 contenders below:
Jon Rahm +1100
Justin Thomas +1200

Gaining ownership of the highly-coveted green jacket that is awarded to the victor is one of the biggest honours any professional golfer can experience and there are plenty in contention this time around.
Neither player has won the Masters before, but both have been in excellent form in recent times and are fancied by a number of pundits to win the tournament for the first time.
Those include the Super Bowl, March Madness, the NBA Finals and the World Series, amongst others, and they are absolutely joined by the Masters in that category.
There will be thousands of golf betting fans all entering this weekend with a keen interest on the odds of each player and looking to spot the best value.
They are then followed by a cluster of +1800 shots in Dustin Johnson, Cameron Smith, Scottie Scheffler and Brooks Koepka, while Rory McIlroy is +2200.
Taking place annually at the famous Augusta National Golf Club, it is one of the four golf majors and the fan favourite.
It has become tradition for the majority of sports betting sites to offer additional places on EW bets on the Masters.
Spaniard Rahm is currently ranked second in the world and is closely followed by Justin Thomas at +1200.
At the time of writing, BetOnline have Jon Rahm as the favorite to win the Masters at +1100.
